benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/invoicePayments/{paymentId}/tags - Add tags to payment

covered: Valid Request scenarios for successful tag additions
Empty Response scenario when no tags are provided (empty array)
Various input validation scenarios (malformed body, invalid UUIDs, extra fields)
gaps: Pagination: no tests cover pagination handling for large tag result sets
Caching Behavior: no tests for caching headers like ETag or Cache-Control
Rate Limiting: no explicit tests for rate limiting or throttling under burst load
recommendations: Add explicit pagination tests for large tag result sets to validate pagination tokens, page sizes, and correct data slicing
Introduce tests verifying caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control) and cache invalidation behavior
Add dedicated rate limiting/throttling tests to ensure graceful handling under high request rates
Consider explicit negative tests for edge cases around idempotency (repeated identical requests) to confirm no duplicate resources are created under various concurrency conditions
